name: WINIM
description:
In this game, you must collaborate and synchronize to reach the end of the level. Avoid the spikes, jump and roll to finish the level.

And don't trust the purple rings.

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Avoid the spikes.
  2. Collect the rings.
  3. Reach the end.

This is the last creation of Tequifresi Studios' team, a group born in a game  jam. This is our second jam and we want you to enjoy our game.

Developed by:

  • Carlos Agudo Postigo: https://ac3po.itch.io/
  • Pablo Brusint Llorca: https://espermatogonia.itch.io/

  • Guillermo Nicolás: https://tupso.itch.io/
